Donna McKechnie (born November 16, 1942) is an American musical theater 
dancer, singer, actress, and choreographer. She is known for her professional 
and personal relationship with choreographer Michael Bennett, with whom she 
collaborated on her most noted role, "Cassie" from the musical A Chorus ... She is 
also known for playing Amanda Harris/Olivia Corey on the Gothic...
